review: Dr. Rakesh has very good patience in explaining though we are with  100  questionnaires. He clearly explains the problem we ve and gives accurate solutions of it. I underwent pain free non surgical extraction method where as all the other dentists, who diagnosed me, stated that only option is to surgically extract the wisdom tooth..it was absolutely pain free like he said before the treatment.. m totally satisfied..

reply_text: Thanks Swapna. you and your teeth behaved like sweethearts.. u made it easier for us.

review:

He is quite good. I would recommend him to anyone without a second thought.

review: Yet to clarify the reason for my tooth capâ€™s improper fixation. Also yet to explore the reasons provided for the same. Surprised to know the growth after filing the same.
reply_text:
Mr.Prakash reason was clearly explained to you in clinic ,that you have to report to clinic exactly 3 days post your impression,as there will be gradual drifting of tooth and dimensional changes in impression. Knowing this you had come only after 3WEEKSand even while delivering instead of going for a new one ,we spent around half an hour filing it, because you presented yourself with a lapse of 3 weeks. You indeed said u knew consequences of coming after long time and excused yourself, we are surprised you are coming up with this as a query. THERE IS NO IMPROPER FIXATION and we also gave you the option of supporting you if any discomfort. What's disappointing is giving you so much time for your IMPROPER TIMING and  you so easily bad mouth a doctor. 
Your excuse through SMs for rescheduling the  scheduled appointment  to Dr. Kirthana is intact .
